sitewide.translation_message: This application is translated by users like you! If you see items that are not translated (or have suggestions for improvements!) please suggest improvements on GitHub.

device_config.mDNS_id_desc: Host name (the xxxx in http://xxxx.local/). Must be 8-31 characters.
device_config.tz_offset_desc: Time Zone Offset from GMT (in hours). Used for Google Sheets.
device_config.smooth_factor_desc: Valid range is 0 to 99. Setting affects time constant of exponentially weighted moving average filter applied to specific gravity reading. In response to a step change, the filtered value should reach steady state after ~ 5 time constants. A setting of 0 gives no smoothing (filtering off) while higher values mean more smoothing.  A setting of 60 gives time constant of just over 5 seconds while 99 results in ~ 5 minutes.
device_config.invert_tft_desc: - Use if the screen is upside-down

errors.mdns_invalid_chars: mDNS ID can only consist of the letters a-z, a hyphen, or numbers, and must not start with a hyphen
errors.mdns_invalid_length: mDNS ID must be between 8 and 31 characters
errors.invalid_smoothing_factor: Specific gravity smoothing factor must be between 0 and 99
errors.invalid_tz_offset: Timezone offset must be between -12 and 14

update_modal.fail_message: Unable to connect to the TiltBridge or the update was rejected. Please recheck the information provided and reattempt.

fermentrack.target_type_desc: Select the type of system you want to send to
fermentrack.push_frequency_out_of_range: Push frequency must be between 30 and 43200

google_sheets.url_desc: URL of the target Google Script
google_sheets.email_desc: Email address used to create the targeted script
google_sheets.color_sheet_tilt_name_desc: The spreadsheet name to place data for the {color} tilt on

brewers_friend.about_text: These settings control how TiltBridge talks to Brewer's Friend. With a premium account, Brewer's Friend supports logging from gravity sensors such as the Tilt Hydrometer. To find your API key, log into your Brewer's Friend account and go to Profile > Account. Your API key will be a string of letters and numbers (not a URL).
brewers_friend.api_key_desc: API key from your Brewers Friend account settings

brewfather.about_text: These settings control how TiltBridge talks to Brewfather. With a premium account, Brewfather supports logging from gravity sensors such as the Tilt Hydrometer. To find your API key, log into your Brewfather account and go to Settings > Custom Stream. Your Stream key will be a string of letters and numbers (not a URL).
brewfather.api_key_desc: Stream key from your Brewfather account settings

grainfather.about_text: These settings control how TiltBridge talks to Grainfather. Grainfather supports logging from gravity sensors such as the Tilt Hydrometer with an account. To find your API url, log into your Grainfather account and go to Equipment > Fermentation Devices. Add a "Tilt" fermentation device for each color Tilt you want to log. After adding the Tilt, the URL required below can be found under setup instructions (accessible by clicking the circled "i" next to the Tilt in Grainfather).
grainfather.grainfather_url_desc: Enter the Grainfather URL for your {color} Tilt Hydrometer

brewstatus.about_text: These settings control how TiltBridge talks to BrewStatus. To disable pushing to BrewStatus, delete the BrewStatus URL.
brewstatus.brewstatus_url_desc: Brewstatus URL to push tilt data to for your account

taplist_io.about_text: These settings control how TiltBridge talks to Taplist.io. To disable pushing to Taplist.io, delete the Taplist.io URL.
taplist_io.taplistio_url_desc: Taplist.IO URL to push tilt data to for your account

mqtt.broker_address_desc: Enter the MQTT broker server address (Hostname or IP)
mqtt.mqtt_topic_desc: The MQTT topic to publish data to
mqtt.mqtt_push_every_desc: How often to push data (in seconds)

generic_target.about_text: This target allows you to send a generic JSON payload containing your Tilt data to a service that TiltBridge otherwise does not support
generic_target.generic_target_url_desc: The URL to which to push a payload containing JSON data covering your Tilts
